= Macaron Java back door =

The back door can detect the environment and use different techniques
to inject a hook in the HTTP request work flow. Then, with the presence of
the key `M4c4r0n` in any field, an agent is presented.

 * [historyAgent History]: Memorize last 20 requests
 * [jndiAgent JNDI]: Consult JNDI
 * [jmxAgent JMX]: Consult and invoke JMX
 * [jdbcAgent JDBC]: Invoke database
 * [javaAgent Java/Javascript]: Compile and execute code in the JavaEE server
 * [shellAgent Shell]: Invoke a shell
